definition: a structural member used to stiffen a framework, to support by placing braces
details:
noun
- a structural member used to stiffen a framework
= synonyms: bracing
- a carpenter's tool having a crank handle for turning and a socket to hold a bit for boring
= synonyms: bitstock
- an appliance that corrects dental irregularities
= synonyms: braces, orthodontic braces
- a support that steadies or strengthens something else
= example: a support that steadies or strengthens something else
- elastic straps that hold trousers up (usually used in the plural)
= synonyms: suspender, gallus
- a rope on a square-rigged ship that is used to swing a yard about and secure it
- either of two punctuation marks ({ or }) used to enclose textual material
- a set of two similar things considered as a unit
= synonyms: pair
- two items of the same kind
= synonyms: span
verb
- to support by placing braces
= example: to support by placing braces
- to support or hold steady and make steadfast, with or as if with a brace
= example: to support or hold steady and make steadfast, with or as if with a brace
= synonyms: steady
- to prepare oneself for something unpleasant or difficult
= example: to prepare oneself for something unpleasant or difficult
= synonyms: poise
